name: Primitive Hanger Bay
desc: This ship is equipped with a primitive hanger bay, resulting in its fighter wings refitting %s slower.

name: Repair Apparatus
desc:
This ship is equipped with a Metelson proprietary series of cumbersome repair apparatuses, increasing the rate of fleet-wide repairs by %s.
Can only repair one ship at a time and is unable to repair frigates.
short: Increases a single large ship's repair by 15%.

name: Metelson Specs
desc: This ship has been modified to match Metelson Industries specifications resulting in a %s/%s/%s/%s increase in armor and hull strength, depending on hull size. Additionally the energy systems were fine-tuned increasing flux throughput and capacity by %s over standard examples of this hull.
short: A Metelson edition of a vessel.

name: Ionic Hullnodes
desc: Metelson Industries has devised a groundbreaking integration of the ship's armor with its flux network, creating a continuous ionic shield encasing the hull. This hullmod boosts armor by %s/%s/%s/%s points, depending on hull size. This gives a %s reduction in damage from projectile, EMP and fragmentation damage. However, missile weapons are unaffected by this change. Ionic Hullnodes have a %s vulnerability against beam weapons due to how its structured.
short: Alters damage taken, does NOT affect missiles.
sModDesc: Reduces damage by an additional %s. Take only %s extra beam damage.
